price: Será que vossos renegadores da Fé, ó Quraich, são melhores que aqueles, ou tendes absolvição, nas Escrituras?
arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: akuffārukum khayrun min ulāikum am lakum barāatun fī al-zuburi
